title: Not Everybody Believes In Shamila, But According To This Expert, Maybe You Should??
text:
This just in: Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello, a couple that some thought wouldn’t last the summer (amid rumors that their romance was just a PR stunt), are still together and packing on the PDA as fall (better known as cuffing season) approaches.

Despite those super-steamy photos of them making out and holding hands that *conveniently* made the rounds just days after their single Señorita dropped (AND Camila and her ex Matthew Hussey split), Shawn promises Shamila is the real deal and “definitely not a publicity stunt” to help their song reach the top of the charts. And, if that isn't enough, there’s always that raw and very unexpected Instagram video Shawn shared featuring a ton of tongue to really drill it in.

Look, maybe Shamila fans are right and this romance really has been brewing since 2015, when the couple released their first song, I Know What You Did Last Summer, and now they’re finally letting fans in on what they did this summer.

Or...maybe not.

Instead of spending another one of the final few summer days speculating whether Shamila is or isn’t an industry prop, WH brought in an expert. Jane Greer, PhD, a relationship and family therapist in New York and author of What About Me? Stop Selfishness From Ruining Your Relationship, stepped in to analyze the couple’s body language and confirm once and for all, whether Shawn and Camila are actually, really, truly in a genuine relationship. Here's her take.
